Text: ^ No. (extras aren't usually included, unless it says so... and this doesn't)

Thank you! I actually bought this Blu-ray, it's the first physical film I've felt was worth buying in over a year, but I'm downloading this to have a HD portable copy.

This film is very ambitious, it's not perfect, but it really is worth watching and the effort made to film and release this film is very inspirational.
extremely ambitious film.. the kind of film you really need to see twice - totally worth it though!
